description: Try our easy to follow Butter Bean Panzanella With Sourdough Chunks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Butter Bean Panzanella With Sourdough Chunks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 170°C (Gas 3). Cut the bread into 1cm cubes. On a baking sheet, arrange the bread cubes in a single layer and bake for 15 minutes, or until toasted and light golden brown.

Meanwhile, to make the dressing, in a small bowl whisk together the vinegar and Dijon mustard. While whisking, drizzle in the olive oil and thoroughly combine. Stir in the garlic, oregano, and basil. Set aside.

To assemble, in a large salad bowl, add the tomatoes, butter beans, cucumber, and sweetcorn. Fold in the toasted bread, then drizzle the dressing over. Toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
